articles.title: On Spike Lee’s "Da 5 Bloods"—and My Own Return to Vietnam
articles.description: Twenty years after his service in the infamous Americal Division, Pulitzer Prize–winning poet Yusef Komunyakaa went back to Hanoi with his own group of veterans to reckon with their former enemies.
articles.content:
Finally, I couldnt wait. Here was a question that lingered in my psyche for decades. I said, General Giap, was Black Lang real or myth?
The general said, He is real. And he is alive.
